upper.name: Push-ups
upper.instructions: Keep your back straight and lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor.

upper.name: Pull-ups
upper.instructions: Hang from a bar with hands shoulder-width apart and pull your body up until your chin is above the bar.

upper.name: Plank Shoulder Taps
upper.instructions: In a plank position, tap each shoulder with the opposite hand while maintaining a stable core.

upper.name: Tricep Dips
upper.instructions: Use a sturdy chair, lower your body by bending your elbows, and push back up.

upper.name: Arm Circles
upper.instructions: Extend your arms out to the sides and make small to large circles.

upper.name: Diamond Push-ups
upper.instructions: Place your hands close together under your chest in a diamond shape and perform a push-up.

upper.name: Chest Fly
upper.instructions: Lying on your back, hold weights above your chest and lower your arms out to the sides, then bring them back together.

upper.name: Renegade Rows
upper.instructions: In a plank position, row one arm up with a dumbbell while keeping your body stable.

upper.name: Pike Push-ups
upper.instructions: From a downward-facing dog position, lower your head to the ground and push back up.

upper.name: Overhead Press
upper.instructions: Press weights overhead while standing or seated.

upper.name: Plank to Push-up
upper.instructions: Start in a plank position, lower yourself onto your forearms, then push back up to your hands.

upper.name: Lateral Raises
upper.instructions: Hold weights at your sides and raise your arms out to shoulder height, then lower back down.

upper.name: Inchworms
upper.instructions: From standing, walk your hands out into a plank, do a push-up, then walk your hands back.

upper.name: Bench Dips
upper.instructions: With your hands on a bench and your feet on the ground, lower your hips while bending your elbows, and then push back up.

upper.name: Bear Crawls
upper.instructions: Crawl forward on your hands and feet while keeping your hips low and your back straight.
